info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Madison County through 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Newport, or 8 miles west of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Mars Hill, Hot Springs, Walnut, Luck, Spring Creek, Max Patch and Canto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
